snippet: Moto-polo, a game in Rwanda that utilizes motorcycles instead of horses, has few rules, lots of beer breaks and frenzied speeds of up to 45 miles per hour.
abstract: Moto-polo, a game in Rwanda that utilizes motorcycles instead of horses, has few rules, lots of beer breaks and frenzied speeds of up to 45 miles per hour.
lead_paragraph: Moto-polo, a game in Rwanda that utilizes motorcycles instead of horses, has few rules, lots of beer breaks and frenzied speeds of up to 45 miles per hour.

headline.seo: Motorized Polo Gains a Foothold in East Africa
headline.main: A Lot Like Polo, Only Faster and With Beer
